message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us at $1,200,000, reflecting its exceptional quality and unique features. Given its significance to both parties, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a rare chance to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.
